CustomField.description: Total Line Price (Usage quantity multiplied by line's unit price)
CustomField.formula: IF(Billable_Quantity__c > 0, Billable_Quantity__c * Actual_Price2__c - (Discount__c*(Billable_Quantity__c * Actual_Price2__c)), Actual_Quantity2__c * Actual_Price2__c - (Discount__c*(Actual_Quantity2__c * Actual_Price2__c)))
CustomField.label: Total Line Price
